content:
Hi,
I'm investigating a debuginfo failure on recent Ubuntu armhf (armv7a+hardfloat), which results in SIGILL being raised during the GDB session. I'd like to investigate one of the produced binary, but I couldn't find it on my system. Anyone knows where I could find them?
It is somewhere in the build/<triple>/test directory I believe.
Oh, it's just call a, I was looking for a binary with the same basename as the Rust source file. Thanks!
